pr_title: Add ability to update a check run

timeline.message: Add a test for check updates
Add wiremocks for tests, move existing tests to test org

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason you needed to update existing tests? Once the mocks are created they should continue to work so long as you are not actually changing the behavior of the existing APIs, which AFAICT you are not.
timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText: It was to make it easier to update them for others by moving the tests to the test org and an app that others can use I believe  (could be a separate pr)
replies.author: timja

timeline.message: Add method for updating check run by ID
